root.text: As Steve Jobs rightly said, 'Innovation distinguishes between a follower and a leader.’ Here we are providing you the perfect platform to showcase your leadership skills! Design the most elegant ideas and practical solution to a problem in the fields mentioned below as bright minds require a pedestal to portray, the KRIYA2K20 offers you this dynamic opportunity to do so and get  a chance to win exciting prizes!

text: Subjects necessarily need not to be confined within the above.
Send your paper (IEEE format in PDF form) to presentista2k20psgkriya@gmail.com
Last date for sending the abstract is 13/02/2020, Shortlisted participants will be intimated within 15/02/2020.
The papers will be judged based on objectives, methodology, findings and analysis, conclusion, implication/application/limitation.
Decision of the judges would be final.
The paper should be brief containing at most 300 words and citing the references is mandatory.
Best few teams will be selected and would be invited to present.
The teams have to submit their Hard copy of the paper on that day of the event.
The presentation (of the shortlisted participants) should last a maximum of 10 minutes. This will be followed by a 5 minutes Q & A session.
